attributes.action: Help the families in New Zealand who are victims of the recent terrorist attack
attributes.background: Victims in New Zealand need to know that governments across the world are there to help and support them starting with the UK government. Not only will it help families in New Zealand, but it will also help other families who are or have been victims to know that they are not alone.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take to help these families.

You might like to sign this petition calling for a national one minute's silence instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/248293
